rules_text:
When this creature attacks, it gains flying and lifelink until end of turn.
{W}: Put a keyword counter on target creature with that keyword from the following options: first strike, flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, ward, lifelink, menace, reach, daunt, trample, and vigilance. Activate only as a sorcery.
